phrases.original: Can pre-authorize disciples to become new users
phrases.translated: Can pre-authorize disciples to become new users

phrases.original: Can delegate the right to pre-authorize disciples
phrases.translated: Can delegate the right to pre-authorize disciples

phrases.original: All users must be authorized before they can use the Invites App. This is for security purposes, and it ensures that every user is a member in good standing with the International Christian Churches.
phrases.translated: All users must be authorized before they can use the Invites App. This is for security purposes, and it ensures that every user is a member in good standing with the International Christian Churches.

phrases.original: You can make the process of authorization quick (and barely noticeable) by letting {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} pre-authorize disciples, in advance, to register for the Invites App.
phrases.translated: You can make the process of authorization quick (and barely noticeable) by letting {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} pre-authorize disciples, in advance, to register for the Invites App.

phrases.original: You can make the process of authorization quick (and barely noticeable) by letting {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} pre-authorize disciples (male or female), in advance, to register for the Invites App.
phrases.translated: You can make the process of authorization quick (and barely noticeable) by letting {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} pre-authorize disciples (male or female), in advance, to register for the Invites App.

phrases.original: If {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} leads a house church or higher, choose this option.
phrases.translated: If {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} leads a house church or higher, choose this option.

phrases.original: If {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} is a Women's Ministry Leader, or co-leads a house church (or higher), choose this option.
phrases.translated: If {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} is a Women's Ministry Leader, or co-leads a house church (or higher), choose this option.

phrases.original: By allowing him to pre-authorize the leaders that he oversees, you can leverage the power of delegation to quickly get all of his people to begin using the Invites App.
phrases.translated: By allowing him to pre-authorize the leaders that he oversees, you can leverage the power of delegation to quickly get all of his people to begin using the Invites App.

phrases.original: By allowing her to pre-authorize other leaders (male or female) within her group, you can leverage the power of delegation to quickly get disciples at all levels within that group to begin using the Invites App.
phrases.translated: By allowing her to pre-authorize other leaders (male or female) within her group, you can leverage the power of delegation to quickly get disciples at all levels within that group to begin using the Invites App.
